casebody.data:
HARVEY MOORE AND ASSOCIATES, INC., a Florida corporation, Appellant,
v.
HAHN LOESER & PARKS, LLP, an Ohio limited liability partnership; Trial Practices, Inc., a Florida corporation; Trial Simulations, Inc., a Florida Corporation; Trial Visualization, Inc., a Florida corporation; Harvey Moore, an individual; and Lynette M. Moore, an individual, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-3193 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed October 10, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
